messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My Pokémon were taken from me...
Team Galactic did it...Ever since, I’ve never forgiven
their faces...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m not doing my Pokémon any favors
by ruining its memory like this...I can’t be wallowing around forever.
I gotta move on and turn the page.
